englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi

arabicText: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ
englishTranslationText: “Move	towards	what	you	used	to	deny!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Chalo	uski	taraf	jise	jhutlāte	they.

arabicText: ٱنطَلِقُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّۢ ذِى ثَلَـٰثِ شُعَبٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
“Move	towards	the	shadow	of	the	smoke	
having	three	branches.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Chalo	us	dhuweiñ	ke	sāaye	ki	taraf	jiski	
teen	shakheiñ

arabicText: لَّا ظَلِيلٍۢ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِنَ ٱللَّهَبِ
englishTranslationText:
“Which	neither	gives	shade,	nor	saves	
from	the	flame.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Na	sāya	de	na	lapat	se	bachāye

englishTranslationText:
Indeed	hell	throws	up	sparks	like	huge	
castles.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak	dozakh	chingāriyañ	urdāti	hai	
jaise	ooñche	mahel

englishTranslationText: Seeming	like	yellow	camels.
romanUrduTranslationText: Goya	woh	zard	rang	ke	ooñt	haiñ

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi

englishTranslationText:
This	is	a	day	in	which	they	will	not	be	able	
to	speak.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ueh	din	hai	ke	woh	na	bol	sakeñge

englishTranslationText: Nor	will	they	be	given	permission	to	present	excuses.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	na	unheiñ	ijāzat	mile	ke	uzr	kareñ

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi

englishTranslationText: This	is	the	Day	of	Decision;	We	have	gathered	you	and	all	the	earlier	men.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	hai	faisle	ka	din	ham	ne	tumheiñ	jam’a	kiya	aur	sab	agloñ	ko

englishTranslationText: If	you	now	have	any	conspiracy,	carry	it	out	on	Me.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ab	agar	tumhāra	koi	dāoñ	ho	to	mujh	par	chal	lo

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi.

englishTranslationText: Indeed	the	pious	are	in	shades	and	springs.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	dar	wāle	sāyoñ	aur	chashmoñ	meiñ	haiñ	.

englishTranslationText: And	among	fruits	whichever	they	may	desire.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	mewoñ	meiñ	jo	unka	ji	chāhe

arabicText: كُلُوا۟ وَٱشْرَبُوا۟ هَنِيٓـًٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
englishTranslationText: “Eat	and	drink	with	pleasure,	the	reward	of	your	deeds.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Khāo	aur	piyo	rachta	huwa	apne	a’amāl	ka	sila

englishTranslationText: This	is	how	We	reward	the	virtuous.
romanUrduTranslationText: Be-shak	nekoñ	ko	ham	aisa	hi	badla	dete	haiñ.

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	kharābi

englishTranslationText: “Eat	and	enjoy	for	a	while	-	indeed	you	are	guilty.”
romanUrduTranslationText: Kuch	din	kha	lo	aur	barat	lo	zaroor	tum	mujrim	ho

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ	ki	kharābi.

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱرْكَعُوا۟ لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
englishTranslationText: And	when	it	is	said	to	them,	“Offer	the	prayer”	–	they	do	not!
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	jab	unse	kahā	jāye	ke	Namāz	padho	to	nahi	pardhte.

englishTranslationText: Ruin	is	for	the	deniers	on	that	day!
romanUrduTranslationText: Us	din	jhutlāne	waloñ	ki	kharābi

englishTranslationText: So	after	this,	in	what	matter	will	they	believe?
romanUrduTranslationText: Phir	is	ke	b’ad	kaun	si	bāt	par	Imān	lāayeñ	ge?
